Question
========

A study of rush-hour traffic in Amsterdam shows the number of persons per vehicle entering a highway. Suppose *X* is the number of persons per vehicle with a mean of 1.5 and a standard deviation of 0.75 in the population. Could the distribution of *X* be normal?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Incorrect
* No: Correct
